article:
This is a detailed 'list of [[Palestinian people|Palestinian]] [[rocket]]' and
mortar 'attacks on [[Israel]]' in '2011' from the Gaza Strip.

Over the course of 2011, 680 rockets, mortars and Grad missiles were fired from
the Gaza Strip into Israel. [http://www.idf.il/1283-14436-en/Dover.aspx IDF
Spokesperson]
categories: Terrorist attacks attributed to Palestinian militant groups
